mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, product_title, product_info, product_thumb_nail, product_price, category_id, sub_category_id) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{product_title}, #{product_info}, #{product_thumb_nail}, #{product_price}, #{category_id}, #{sub_category_id})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_title, product_info, product_thumb_nail, product_price, category_id, sub_category_id FROM product WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
